programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire
programme.desc: It's home to some of the world's most iconic animals  including the African great apes.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel the flow of some of Canada's tallest waterfalls, and an endless network of rivers and creeks provides the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise
programme.desc: The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. From just a few meters wide, to hundreds of kilometers across, each of the over 7,000 islands are different, and each has its own unique wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as mega-diverse. Malaysia's animals and plants have exploited every opportunity to carve out an existence and so have adapted to some very strange ways of life.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are a fortress of submerged trees. / Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An edge-of-your-seat espionage thriller, starring Richard Gere and Topher Grace as ex-CIA and FBI agents, trying to find the killer of a US senator, which bears the hallmark of an infamous Soviet assassin, thought to be dead.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Black Knight
programme.desc: When a wisecracking black hustler from South Central L.A. finds himself transported back to medieval England, he leads the overthrow of an evil king and wins the heart of a proto feminist woman.

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: Code Name: Diamond Head
programme.desc: Counterintelligence takes on new meaning in this barely coherent tale of Hawaiian espionage that takes place on movie sets meant to look like Hawaii.

programme.title: Blood Waters of Dr. Z

programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken Out
programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser
programme.desc: Serial killer Leonard Fraser was suspected of killing at least five women over a 17 year period but took the complete truth about his life of crime to his grave.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Of Hearts and Hunters
programme.desc: Jodi faces a gut-wrenching decision when Matt is forced back into witness protection - will she choose love over Drovers Run? It's sibling rivalry gone mad when Marcus and Alex compete to woo Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Climb Every Mountain
programme.desc: Kate uncovers the shocking truth about Jodi and Matt's murder. Meg returns for Jodi's funeral with a bizarre secret. Alex takes drastic action to prove how much he loves Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sisters Are Doing It For Themselves
programme.desc: Regan tries to reconcile with her wild-at-heart sister Grace McLeod, after Grace inherits part-ownership of Drovers Run. Riley is seduced by a sexy cowgirl, with disastrous results while Kate is determined to prove her bizarre farming methods to Marcus.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Alex's plan to propose to Stevie goes horribly wrong, when a series of accidents and disasters threaten to ruin their relationship.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Bloodlines
programme.desc: When sheep rustlers steal Drovers Run's breeding stock, Grace takes the law into her own hands. Regan struggles to convince Grace to stay permanently at Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Warts and All
programme.desc: Bryce resorts to blackmail to force Alex and Stevie into signing a pre-nuptial agreement. Stevie takes drastic action to avoid being pigeonholed as "Mrs. Alex Ryan".

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dudley Dead Wright
programme.desc: A homeowner's property backs up to land where a cursed 1740's village once stood.Could evil entities have traveled from that property tothis terrified mother's homeputting her family at risk?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Manor of Mystery
programme.desc: A Museum Director and a volunteer are fearful that an upcoming Victorian exhibit about the Victorian Era and Spiritualism will uncover and agitate entities from that time period.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 1
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police.

programme.title: Operation Repo: El Prisionero
programme.desc: Lou and his cousin Rob face trouble on the job when a debtor makes shocking claims to police about the newest member of the Pizarro clan. Plus, will a repossession from a well-connected socialite end with Matt and Froy riding into the sunset?

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession.

programme.title: Operation Repo: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for typical vehicle repossession...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Contact
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Baby Girl
programme.desc: As Kim prepares to raise Michael’s baby, Professor Oglevee tries to sort out his feelings for Nikki.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: CRAZY LOVE
programme.desc: Nikki’s torn between two lovers: Professor Oglevee and his sexy friend, Kenny.

programme.title: NEW The Parkers: Not So Super, Super
programme.desc: Nikki and Kim cause chaos as the superintendents of their apartment complex.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Being a Big Boy
programme.desc: Andi lets Gary know that she is not ready to marry him. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Chase
programme.desc: The couples of this union are challenged with the inconsistency of their relationships. (S3, ep6)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Protecting Myself
programme.desc: Andi is walking a thin line seeing Robin behind Gary's back while trying to stay out of Fatima, Karen and Zac's love triangle. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Little White Lie
programme.desc: Fatima believes she's caught Gary in a compromising position and calls Andi to rush home to drop in on him unexpectantly. (S3, ep8)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Glove
programme.desc: When a terrifying haunting threatens to break a Daisytown, PA couple apart, PRS is their last resort. As the investigation deepens, PRS and the family learn that it's just the tip of iceberg, turns out this haunting might be all in the family.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Capesthorne Hall
programme.desc: The beauty of this magnificent Cheshire country house hides the horror that lies in its corridors. As well a poltergeist activity the team manage to catch some of their best evidence to date and even our sceptic hears noises.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Hero
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet is denied government assistance, despite having lost a leg and an arm.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Parents' Day
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark work as police detectives in a school. Their assignment: to investigate drug selling.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Father's Faith
programme.desc: A fisherman's livelihood is in jeopardy because of the amount of time he devotes to his comatose son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Heavy Date
programme.desc: A young man learns that the girl he's in love with is pregnant.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: A lonely spy-story writer buys her murdered hero's sports car, which comes complete with his ghost.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Meerly Evan
programme.desc: Evan lets the mischievous meerkats loose in Rosie's room to cause havoc. Rosie is devastated when they destroy an irreplaceable photograph of her mother and rages at Evan. She decides once and for all to go back to Bristol.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Evan Meets Elli
programme.desc: Rogue young male elephants are rampaging through Leopard's Den and destroying everything the family have built, so Danny introduces a matriarch elephant in the hope that she will calm them down.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Dawn Feeling
programme.desc: At a typically rowdy family breakfast, Rosie is excitedly looking forward to the arrival of her friend Izzy, whilst Danny is concerned about the rumour of ivory poachers in the area. Unnoticed, Miranda the lion cub pads off into the bush.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Trevanions have been living at Leopard's Den for over a year. The wildlife is roaming freely and the family are settled into African way of life. Business however is not good. With an abundance of game lodges competition is fierce.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: It's the grand reopening of Mara and a British wildlife charity is using the event to release a vulture back into the wild. Fatani, the new, young and ambitious manager of Mara has hired Danny as the vet to oversee the release.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Second Case
programme.desc: A woman’s mangled body is found beside a lonely stretch of highway. When the coroner suspects foul play, Kenda is called in to solve the second homicide case of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Dead Weight
programme.desc: A seemingly random attack leaves Mary Moebus dead, and police flummoxed by a daunting field of suspects. But when Lt Joe Kenda uncovers a cache of new evidence, he realizes someone’s been lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Mr. Violence
programme.desc: 29yr old Chris is shot in cold blood outside a neighborhood bar. Faced with a trio of suspects, Kenda trusts his gut and makes a controversial decision.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Preying on the Innocent
programme.desc: When the son of a prominent politician is murdered in his basement, Lt. Joe Kenda feels pressure from City Hall to solve the case.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: New Year's Evil
programme.desc: It’s New Year’s Eve weekend, and in the midst of the revelry Miguel Mendez is beaten to death outside a convenience store. Lt. Joe Kenda faces a challenging investigation.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Mascot Mayhem
programme.desc: A German shepherd might be evicted because of his barking, and a bulldog with behavior issues isn't welcome at her owner's café. Can Cesar help?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tenacious B
programme.desc: A French Bulldog is anxious around other dogs, and a Vizsla is afraid of cars. Can Cesar help one dog improve his social skills and steer the other's behavior toward the fast lane?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Charlotte, Elvis and Jack
programme.desc: Actress Eileen Davidson's Wheaten terrier puppy Charlotte, plays too rough with her son. Two other dogs react to household triggers, the garbage disposal and shiny floors.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Highlights from various Dog Whisperer stories that impart Cesar Millan’s advice for every stage of a dog’s lifespan. We follow old and new cases that show the process of adopting the right dog.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Desperate Housedogs
programme.desc: Three Huskies are out of control on walks; a Labrador puppy chews on everything; a Spaniel/Mastiff mix snaps at other dogs; and three German shepherds bully other dogs. Cesar! Help!

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bodhi, Maggie & Molly, and Bojo
programme.desc: Bloodhound/Catahoula mix, Bojo, is aggressive when it comes to mealtime. Molly and Maggie, two territorial Maltese, and a Kerry Blue Terrier in need of some calm assertive energy.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Wedding

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella's Tent of Portent/Mutiny on the Pitch
programme.desc: At the Elwood City Picnic, Prunella pretends she can see the future at her fortune telling booth. The Lakewood Elementary soccer team has had enough of Francine's bossy behavior.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Vs. Binky/Operation: DW!
programme.desc: Binky may be tough and strong, but when it comes to sports, he always seems to choke. D.W. is having trouble hearing and needs an ear operation. Is it okay to be just a little bit scared?

programme.title: Arthur: The Good Sport/Crushed
programme.desc: When the Athlete of the Year Award doesn't go to Francine, she makes no effort to hide her hurt feelings from the recipient. Arthur can't believe his parents are hiring a babysitter--he's 8 years old, and babysitters are b-o-r-i-n-g!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Plays The Blues/Buster's Sweet Success
programme.desc: Arthur's beloved piano teacher is retiring, but she assures him that the new teacher is outstanding--and famous, too! When Buster signs up to sell candy for the band, he figures it's easy money -- who doesn't love chocolate?

programme.title: Arthur: Home Sweet Home/Do You Believe in Magic
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: So Funny I Forgot to Laugh/The Best Day Ever
programme.desc: Arthur thinks his jokes about Sue Ellen's new sweater are in good fun but Sue Ellen's feelings are hurt. Has Arthur become a bully? Everyone is reminiscing about their "best days." Except Arthurs. Is it possible he doesn't have one?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur vs. The Very Mean Crossing Guard/D.W.'s Very Bad Mood
programme.desc: Arthur and The Brain encounter a new crossing guard on the way home from school. This guard isn't just mean, he's nuts! And, D.W. is making Arthur's life miserable! Francine decides she'd fix D.W.'s behavior before Arthur loses his mind.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Sells Out/Mind Your Manners
programme.desc: To earn the money for a new video game, Arthur decides to sell his old toys through his school's Web site. The Tibble Twins want to take Grandmother out to dinner, but she'd rather stay home. Is it because of their terrible table manners?

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: By the end of the war the RAF had aircraft that could escort bombers to targets deep inside Germany and back. With the Gloster Meteor, the RAF had also entered the ‘Jet Age’. Aircraft like the Hawker Hunter and F-86 Sabre took the RAF supersonic.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.desc: When some of the children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race./When BJ starts to feel sick after eating too many sweets, he lies down in hopes of feeling better.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.desc: At the halfway mark of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season some teams are working well together and killing it while others are floundering and on the verge of killing each other.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Take It to the Bank
programme.desc: The Gloucester captains face a familiar decision: whether or not to take the long, high-¬-risk journey to Georges Bank to increase their chances of a big bluefin haul.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Doubling Down
programme.desc: After a massive haul offshore on Georges Bank last week, Captain Dave Carraro of FV-¬-Tuna.com and Captain TJ Ott of Hot Tuna decide to double down and make the long trip again.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: The Priscillia Ciatti Case
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and –an extra sordid detail – a devil mask is found next to her body.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Last Gasps
programme.desc: A mother of infant twins notices that her son is not breathing. EMTs attempt to revive him, but it's too late. Now, Dr. G must work fast to determine if the other twin's life is in danger.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Fearing The Worst
programme.desc: Even with many leads, including an insulin overdose, a tooth infection, and chronic lupus, the pieces don’t add up in the case of a woman's death. Will Dr. G be able to uncover the truth?

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Speeds
programme.desc: Motor vehicle fatalities account for many of the cases that come into the morgue. Dr. G offers expertise as to how to get behind the wheel and not wind up on a steel table.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Disturbing Behavior
programme.desc: Leo Guzman falls off a ladder while painting a house. At first, his death seems to be an open-and-shut case but, as the autopsy unfolds, Dr. G believes there may be more to this case.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Victoria Day Shooter
programme.desc: On a single rain-soaked night during the Victoria Day weekend, police are called to the scene of three very similar crimes.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Lethal Injector
programme.desc: In 1996, nurses and patients at the Veteran's Affairs Medical Center in Northampton are concerned. It seems that wherever nurse Kristen Gilbert goes, death follows.

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: No Body, No Crime
programme.desc: When a mother and her step-daughter go missing, investigators zero in on an unlikely suspect who almost commits a perfect crime.

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: House Of Lies
programme.desc: A wife calls 911 to report a burglary and her husband being shot, but the evidence around the house starts to tell a story of its own.

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: Nice Guys Finish Last
programme.desc: Who would want to shoot well known nice guy Trenton Mallory? Detectives wonder if his Trading Trent empire has become his downfall.

programme.title: Surviving Evil: Wolves at the Door
programme.desc: Divorcee Verna White is happily building a new life for herself and three daughters when she runs into old friend Gerald Lee. She spurns his advances but lends a friendly ear to his troubles.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 2
programme.desc: Professional scuba diver Brian Green has been found floating and not breathing, and is on a boat near the Noises, a group of islands in the Hauraki Gulf. The team has to move fast.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 3
programme.desc: On Great Mercury Island near Coromandel, a scuba diver has surfaced unconscious without a pulse. Without Rescue 1 he may soon be dead.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 4
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 team respond to a call out where an elderly couple in their 60s are in a critical condition after a head on collision.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: Auckland's Westpac helicopter crew races to save a 39 year old forestry worker who has been struck on the head leaving him paralyzed from the waist down.

programme.title: A&E After Dark: Episode 4
programme.desc: A suspected drug user passes out at reception.

programme.title: A&E After Dark: Episode 5
programme.desc: A patient shouts and swears at staff.

programme.title: A&E After Dark: Episode 6
programme.desc: A man has injuries after being thrown off his horse and cart.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 8
programme.desc: The chopper crew races to save a woman with a rare disease who's in danger of suffocating from uncontrollable muscle spasms; a badly burnt toddler at Cooks Beach needs an urgent airlift to hospital.

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures

programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.

programme.desc: Today’s the day that the machines get to build their brand new shelter. It’s going to be built into the side of a hill and made using found materials. Lofty, who slept outside at the old yard, decides that he’d like a place in the new shelter.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day, as the team are building Bob’s new workshop at his new yard. Scoop is desperate to get stuck in and beavers about doing everything he can to help. Bob needs some old floorboards collecting from Bobsville, and sends Scoop to pick them up.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy is making a floral display for the town square while Bob repairs a fence in Farmer Pickles’ field. Meanwhile, Spud comes across Mrs Percival putting up posters for the school play – The Three Musketeers.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are building a special flat-packed eco-home for Marjorie. When Muck and Benny spot Marjorie’s canvas tent and Spud’s straw-house, they wonder what else houses can be made from.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergill’s allergies, he goes to his sister’s for the day. But she doesn’t get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Mega Machines: The Movie
programme.desc: Scoop, Muck and Lofty can’t wait to help Bob with his biggest build ever – building a dam and transforming an old quarry into a reservoir to provide Spring City with fresh water.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are finishing refurbishing the old watermill ready to begin milling the first Sunflower Valley flour. Work is just about to start when Dizzy hears a squeaking noise coming from above. There are bats in the old mill!

programme.title: Race to the Finish
programme.desc: Mayor Bentley announces that Sunflower Valley is to stage its very first athletics tournament. A team from Sunflower Valley is to compete against a team of visiting athletes. Plus there is to be a special machine event!

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Joanne Dennehy
programme.desc: Dermot Murnaghan returns to uncover the truth behind the horrific crimes of Peterborough serial killer Joanna Dennehy.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rose West
programme.desc: With her husband Fred, Rose West brutally murdered ten girls between 1973 and 1979, making her one of the most high profile serial killers in the UK.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephen Port
programme.desc: A chilling look at the crimes of Stephen Port, the east London serial killer who poisoned four young men with lethal doses of a date rape drug.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rolf Harris
programme.desc: Rolf Harris became famous for his artwork and music, even painting a portrait of the Queen for the jubilee. But it all came crumbling down in August 2013 when he was accused of 12 assaults on girls as young as eight years old between 1968 and 1986.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Murder Of Jill Dando
programme.desc: Documentary examining the unsolved murder of British TV presenter and newsreader Jill Dando, who was shot outside her house in Fulham, London, in 1999.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Lee Rigby
programme.desc: In broad daylight on a busy Woolwich street on 22nd May 2013, serving soldier Fusilier Lee Rigby was attacked and murdered by Islamic extremists Michael Adebolajo and Michael Adebowale.
